findings.message: index in SirinCrowdsale.deleteGrantee (0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#1072-1075) is a local variable never initialiazed
findings.name: uninitialized-local

findings.message:
RefundVault.claimTokens (0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#662-686) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,tokensToClaim) (0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#680-682)
findings.name: unused-return

findings.message:
RefundVault.claimAllInvestorTokensByOwner (0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#699-706) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,depositedTokenValue) (0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#702)
findings.name: unused-return

findings.message:
